play.libs.ws.ahc

Class StandaloneAhcWSClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.libs.ws.ahc.StandaloneAhcWSClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, StandaloneWSClient

    public class StandaloneAhcWSClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements StandaloneWSClient
    A WS asyncHttpClient backed by an AsyncHttpClient instance.

        Description copied from interface: StandaloneWSClient
